## PrefixedJsonMap.createPrefixed() method

Creates a new [PrefixedJsonMap](./ts-json.prefixedjsonmap.md) from the supplied values

**Signature:**

```typescript
static createPrefixed(prefix: string, values?: MapOrRecord<JsonValue>, context?: IJsonContext, editor?: JsonEditor): Result<PrefixedJsonMap>;
```

Type

</td><td>

string


</td><td>

</td><td>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[PrefixedJsonMap](./ts-json.prefixedjsonmap.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with a [PrefixedJsonMap](./ts-json.prefixedjsonmap.md) or `Failure` with a message if an error occurs.
